synopsis.text: Chocolate, magic, and a late-night adventure await in this enchanting short film directed by You Yoshinari, created to commemorate Lotte's chocolate business' 60th anniversary. As the night unfolds, three spirited girls embark on a captivating journey through the realms of science, magic, and reality within the walls of a mystical chocolate factory. To create the most scrumptious chocolate, they chant the spell 'Chocolat Cadabra' â€“ a secret incantation that adds a touch of excitement to our lives. Prepare to be bewitched as the magic of chocolate comes to life in this delightful tale, with both a 30-second 'Short' and 60-second 'Long' version available for your viewing pleasure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
